tool.name: jellyfish count
tool.description: counts all k-mers in a given sequence
tool.command: jellyfish count -m $m -s $s #if $C and $C != "None" and $C is not None and $C != "": $C #end if #if $L and $L != "None" and $L is not None and $L != "": -L $L #end if #if $U and $U != "None" and $U is not None and $U != "": -U $U #end if -t $t $in_file && jellyfish dump mer_counts.jf #if $L and $L != "None" and $L is not None and $L != "": -L $L #end if #if $U and $U != "None" and $U is not None and $U != "": -U $U #end if -o $out_file

param.label: Don't output k-mer with count lower than lower-count
param.name: L

param.label: Don't output k-mer with count greater than higher-count
param.name: U

tool.help:
**What it does**
Counts k-mers in a FASTA or FASTQ files. This tool runs both the jellyfish count and dump commands.
